name: Vicky Fry
text: I am a true lover of SUNDROP IT IS MY FAVORITE DRINK .So would you please start sending more to south Alabama LIKE GULFSHORES ALABAMA PLEASE PLEASE

name: Noelle Gilliam
text: I love Sundrop. Well without it my day wouldn't be right! 😍😍😍❤❤❤

name: susan walls
text: I love the peach nehi. But where i live in holly pond alabama the delivery person refuses to leave them. The owner of the grocery store has talked to him but he still refuses to leave tbem.. so i give 1 star.. they have good product. When you can get them.  But they are higjer than coke or pepsi products.

name: Zack Taylor
text: Even though it was right at their 17:00 closing time the staff were still friendly enough. They still helped us with our business and the owner even kindly let us know to try and make it a little sooner. 16:45 should be the latest anyone comes across the scales

name: Only Me
text: Went there yesterday to search for some scrap iron and I was told they don't sell scrap iron. They have lost all my business forever.

name: Miss Kitty
text: Great place, fair prices and the people there are super friendly and helpful

name: Dustin Marvin
text: Pretty good place pretty good people

name: Jared Nichols
text: Been dealing with the fine folks there for many years. Is it always pleasant, no. It is very dependable, and usually in and out. It does get busy, not like a few years ago, but they do as best they can. They are family run, and people. Go there with that in mind and it's a ok.
